creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Robe of lavendar k'ossu with scattered design of phoenix, canaries, butterflies and flower blossoms in shades of green, peach, yellow, pink, rose, etc.  Cuffs and border of black satin embroidered with a design of butterflies and flower sprays in satin, laid, and outline stitch; green, yellow, purple, blue, pink, etc.  Inner border of pale blue satin embroidered with flower sprays and edged with trefoil band in band in black.  Lining of lemon yellow silk.
title: Court Robe
